rukus.text: 43|68|Waga shimo be yo, sonohi anata gata ni wa osore mo naku, mata urei mo nai.
43|69|Waga shirushi o shinjite,(ware no ishi ni) fukujū, kie shite ita mono yo,
43|70|anata gata, soshite anata gata no haigūsha mo kanki no naka ni rakuen ni ire.'

43|71|Kare-ra ni wa kazukazu no kogane no sara ya hai ga, tsugitsugini mawasa re (rakuen no) nakaniha kakuji no nozomu mono, mata me o yorokobasu mono ga arou. Anata gata wa eien ni soko ni sumu nodearu.
43|72|Kore ga anata gata no okonatta koto ni taishi, anata gata ni tsuga se rareta rakuendearu.
43|73|Soko ni wa anata gata no tame ni hōfuna kajitsu ga ari, soreni anata gata wa manzoku suru.
43|74|Tsumi o okashita mono wa, jigoku no chōbatsu no naka ni eien ni sumu.
43|75|(Chōbatsu wa) kare-ra no tame ni keigen sa rezu, sono Chū de mattaku kibō o ushinau.
43|76|Ware ga kare-ra ni fugi o hataraita node wanai. Kare-ra ga (mizukara) fugi o hataraita nodearu.
43|77|Kare-ra wa,`kanshu yo, anata no omo ni tanonde watashi-tachi no shimatsu o tsukete kudasai.' To sakebu. Shikashi, kare wa (kotaete),`anata gata wa, tairyū shite ireba yoi nodearu.' To iu.
43|78|Ware wa tashika ni anata gata ni shinri o todoketa. Daga anata gata no ōku wa, shinri o kiratta.
43|79|Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyō to-tachi) wa,(shito ni taishi) sakubō o hari megurashita tsumoridarouga, ware koso,(kare-ra ni taishite sakubō o) megurashite aru.
43|80|Soretomo kare-ra wa, ware ga kare-ra no himegoto ya bōgi o, kikanaito demo omou no ka. Iya, waga shito-tachi (tenshi) wa, kare-ra no katawara de kiroku shite iru.
43|81|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Moshi jihibukaki okata ga ko o mota rerunara, kono watashi ga sono saisho no sūhai-sha to naru.
43|82|Ten to ji no shu,(taiken no) gyokuza no shu, kare-ra no haisuru mono o (chōzetsu nasa reru) omo ni tatae are. '
43|83|Sorede anata gata wa, yakusoku sa reta kare-ra no hi ni tō mensuru made, kare-ra o mudaguchi to tawamure ni hōchi shite okuga ī.
43|84|Kare koso wa ten ni okeru kami, mata ji ni okeru kamideari, eimei ni shite zenchi de ara reru.

43|85|Ten to ji no taiken, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono ga kizoku suru kata, kare ni shukufuku ga aru yō ni. Mata kare no omoto ni dake (shinpan no)-ji no chishiki wa ari, ware no omoto ni anata gata wa kisa reru nodearu.
43|86|Kare no soto ni, kare-ra ga inoru mono wa, torinasu chikara o motanai. Tada shinri o jisshō suru mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra wa (shito o) shitte iru.
43|87|Moshi anata ga kare-ra ni,`dare ga kare-ra o tsukutta nodesu ka.' To toeba, kanarazu `arrā.' To iu. Sorenanoni, kare-ra wa dōshite (shinri kara) mayoi saru no ka.
43|88|(Ware wa yogen-sha ga) `omo yo, korera no mono wa hontōni fushin no mindesu.' To iu no o (kiita).
43|89|(Sorede omo wa ōse rareta. ) Kare-ra kara sorete sari nasai,daga `heian'are.' To (aisatsu shite) ii nasai. Yagate kare-ra mo shirudearou.
